org.biosino.CHS.image
类 ChrCHSRendering

java.lang.Object
  org.biosino.CHS.image.ChrCHSRendering
所有已实现的接口：
Rendering
public class ChrCHSRendering
extends java.lang.Object
implements Rendering

The class renders all CHS between a center chromosome and other surrounding chromosomes.

构造函数摘要
ChrCHSRendering(Chromosome centerChr, java.util.Map<Chromosome,java.util.Set<CHS>> CHSMap, int CHSSize, double CHSPValue)
          Create a new ChrCHSRendering object for the given center chromosomes and all of its CHS and carry on all drawings.
 
方法摘要
 void render(java.awt.Graphics2D g2)
          Render the object.
 
从类 java.lang.Object 继承的方法
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

构造函数详细信息

ChrCHSRendering

public ChrCHSRendering(Chromosome centerChr,
                       java.util.Map<Chromosome,java.util.Set<CHS>> CHSMap,
                       int CHSSize,
                       double CHSPValue)
Create a new ChrCHSRendering object for the given center chromosomes and all of its CHS and carry on all drawings.

参数：
centerChr - the chromosome to be rendered on the center layer
CHSMap - the map between a surrounding chromosome to its CHS list
CHSSize - the minimum size of CHS to be rendered
CHSPValue - the maximum p value of CHS to be rendered
方法详细信息

render

public void render(java.awt.Graphics2D g2)
Render the object. Note all parameters for drawing could be set in the method. They are specified with the size of image to be 800 * 500.

指定者：
接口 Rendering 中的 render
参数：
g2 - a Graphics2D object
